speaker: ME
text: Uh so the general findings from that was uh in the market trends the most important aspect for remote controls were people want a fancy look and feel , rather than the the current functional look and feel of remote controls .

speaker: ME
text: They also also want a remote control to be technologically innovative ,

speaker: ME
text: and of course , as we predicted , that it should be easy to use .

speaker: ME
text: Now I should point out that the first of those findings , fancy look and feel , is the most important ,

speaker: ME
